name: DashPress
author: Andre Renaut

sections.description:
Allows you to display the last items of several feeds in your dashboard

For each widget, aggregates as much feeds as you like (1 to 10) and display the last items (3 to 99). Up to 9 different DashPress widgets on your Dashboard !!!

Version 5.0 includes a complete widget javascript review !

Next features

to be decided

Privacy

This plugin :
1. display images from external sites if set. This external service might collect personal data.
2. is storing data :
* parameters for each dashpress widget
* caching rss feeds
3. is using external libraries
* SimplePie (php class) provided by WordPress (core)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files and folder to your plugin directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Visit your dashboard
sections.changelog:
5.0

2020/05/25 a nicer transition between content and form
* readme.txt reviewed
* complete review of javascript
* new cache class !
* not looking for images into text anymore (time and cpu consuming)
* paypal intrusive form replaced by a link (+ local image) (GDPR, Privacy By Design, Please donate)
* 10th anniversary this year !

4.1

2019/04/10 fixing minor bug

4.0

2019/01/13 everything reviewed from top to bottom :
* more ajax
* use of wp.template …

3.9

2018/02/19 several improvements
* new thumbnail search with extended SimplePie Item class
* changing deprecated calls of SimplePie extended classes

3.8

2017/02/14 sometimes post title is empty …

3.7

2016/10/29 wp 4.7 compatibility (class-feed file removed)

3.6

2016/04/23 wp 4.5 compatibility

3.2

2011/08/01 wp 3.2 compatibility

3.1

2010/12/21 first release
